pages.text: For my money, you can’t go wrong with a sandwich station or a bug fryer. Heck, I’ll even go as far as saying I enjoy a deep-fried bug sandwich from time to time. And hey, while you're feeling adventurous, why not craft some boogers and a glass of milk to wash 'em down.

$(l)On a Budget?$() $(6)Cannibalism$() is your free lunch ticket! ($(o)Hint: hold shift and right-click while holding a cannibal knife$())$(br2)$(l)Special of the Day:$() Sustainably-sourced free-range fried bug tacos.
